channel.title: IFA on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in IFA on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: All the Top New Gadgets We Saw at IFA Berlin 2025
item.description: A tennis-playing robot, TCL’s gargantuan phone, and a whole bunch of new AI-powered wearables. Here are some of the best gadgets we saw at IFA 2025.
